title: Entity Client Resources
description: Defines resource pack rendering resources for an entity (materials, textures, geometry, and animations), keyed by an identifier.

tokens.text: has visual and audio resource definitions

fields.title: Id
fields.description: A targeted identifier this visual/audio description uses.
A list of identified models that this entity uses.

fields.title: Textures
fields.description: A list of identified textures that this entity uses.

fields.title: Geometry model
fields.description: A list of identified models that this entity uses.

fields.title: Animations
fields.description: A list of identified animation that this entity uses.
